clues.clue: Steve Buscemi (yes, "boo-SEH-mee") played Atlantic City as Nucky Thompson on this HBO show

Op art--the term & the movement--came about in this decade

He wasn't a friendly ghost, but Nixon's head of Health, Education & Welfare & also Reagan's Sec. of Defense

final_jeopardy.clue: He was the subject of a 2014 New York Times article headlined "A Pioneer as Elusive as His Particle"
